alert.note: Alert for Orange (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:26PM EDT until June 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Orange County in south central Indiana... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shoals, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paoli, Orleans, French Lick, Orangeville, West Baden Springs, Woodlawn Grove, Braxtons Siding, Bonds, Hindostan and Scarlet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Indiana. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
